item.title: Being Alone Isn’t the Same as Being Lonely
item.description: My post about going to see a movie by yourself has stirred up some wonderful conversations. And the title of this post is the most interesting thought that’s come from it, and I want to dive right in. Being alone isn’t a bad thing.

item.title: Go See a Movie By Yourself
item.description: I just got back from watching the new _Hunger Games _flick. I cried 15+ times in 146 minutes and left the theatre fired up to burn down the establishment. You should see it. I also went alone. And that’s not how you’re supposed to do that thing.
